text: Hotelboy Ed Martin is an East German film. It was released in 1955. ==See also== *Afraid to Talk (1932) ==External links== * Category:1955 films Category:1955 drama films Category:German drama films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:German films based on plays Category:Films set in the United States Category:American film remakes
title: Hotelboy Ed Martin
